modules.name: autorun
modules.script:
self.app_version = '2023-01-26 01:23:10'
self.app_url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndreiPuchko/q2market/main/q2faktura"
self.app_title = "q2faktura"
self.app_description = "Rechnungen und mehr"

import pdfplumber
run_module("ref_ini")

if self.dev_mode:
    self.run_forms()
# run_form("ref_cln")

modules.name: w4
modules.script:
cu = q2cursor("""select distinct product  as name
                ,unit
                , price
                from invoice_lines 
                """).browse()
                
for x in cu.records():
    insert("ref_wrk", x)

reports.name: Invoice
